means: 引人注意的东西，有趣的东西

word_mean: 吸引：把一个物体拉向另一个物体的力量、动作或过程
〔牙齿〕上升咬合异常：牙或其他上颌和下颌结构高于正常位置引起面部缩短的情况，参见abstraction

sentence.Network_en: The major box office attraction was, of course, the inimitable Peter Hunningale.
sentence.Network_cn: 无人能比的彼得·亨宁格尔自然是主要的票房吸引力所在。

sentence.Network_en: The centre of attraction was Pierre Auguste Renoir's oil painting.
sentence.Network_cn: 最吸引人注意的是皮埃尔·奥古斯特·雷诺阿的油画。

sentence.Network_en: Part of the attraction is Darwin's proximity to Asia.
sentence.Network_cn: 达尔文市的魅力一部分在于它靠近亚洲。

atto 渺attraction 引力attractive 有吸引力的

list.abs: (A-B)英语四级词汇表下载 ... attraction n. 吸引；吸引力；引力 attractive a. 有吸引力的 attribute vt. 把…归因于 n.属性.

释疑解难 - 新父母论语 - 金羊社区 ... ... Fish take best after rain. 雨后最易捕鱼。 take，n. attracting， 引起（兴趣，赞赏等）。.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English  (denoting the action of a poultice in drawing matter from the tissues): from Latin attractio(n-), from the verb attrahere (see attract)

entry.def: Attraction is a feeling of liking someone, and often of being sexually interested in them.

example.ex: Our level of attraction to the opposite sex has more to do with our inner confidence than how we look...
example.tran: 我们对异性的吸引程度更多的来自内在的自信，而不是长相。

example.ex: His love for her was not just physical attraction.
example.tran: 他对她的爱慕不只是肉体的吸引。

entry.def: An attraction is a feature which makes something interesting or desirable.

example.ex: ...the attractions of living on the waterfront.

entry.tran: 有吸引力的地方（或事物）
entry.def: An attraction is something that people can go to for interest or enjoyment, for example a famous building.

example.ex: The walled city is an important tourist attraction.
example.tran: 这座由城墙围绕的城市是个重要的旅游胜地。

means.word_mean: 1. the force by which one object attracts another
2. an entertainment that is offered to the public
3. the quality of arousing interest; being attractive or something that attracts;

sentences.sentence: "her personality held a strange attraction for him"

means.word_mean: 4. a characteristic that provides pleasure and attracts;
5. an entertainer who attracts large audiences;

sentences.sentence: "he was the biggest drawing card they had"

auth_sentence.content: The attraction has since been taken off the market.
auth_sentence.res_content: The attraction has since been taken off the market.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The attraction has since been taken off the market.

auth_sentence.content: It is also a tourist attraction of some significance.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is also a tourist attraction of some significance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is also a tourist attraction of some significance.

auth_sentence.content: Every arrow that flies feels the attraction of earth.
auth_sentence.res_content: Every arrow that flies feels the attraction of earth.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Every arrow that flies feels the attraction of earth.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 心烦意乱的,精神不集中
stems_affixes.word_buile: distract[v.分心]+ed……的→adj.心烦意乱的,精神不集中
abs离开+tract拉→被拉开→心不在焉

stems_affixes.value_cn: 吸引人的,引人注意的;漂亮的,迷人的
stems_affixes.word_buile: attract[v.吸引]+ive……的→adj.吸引人的,引人注意的;漂亮的,迷人的
tract拉,拖,抽+or物器→拉的东西→拖拉机
attract[v.吸引]+ion表名词→n.吸引;吸引力;引力
con共同+tract拉,拖,抽→把二者[或以上]拉到一起,形成制约→[订]合同/契约,使缩小
at加强动作+tract拉→拉过来→吸引
con共同+tract拉,拖,抽→把二者[或以上]拉到一起,形成制约→[订]合同/契约,使缩小

Sentence.sentence: For some industrial scientists, however, the attractions of academia (学术界) outweigh any financial considerations.

While schools emphasize its usefulness-online research in class and instant polling of students, for example - a big part of the attraction is, undoubtedly, that the iPhone is cool and a hit with students.
They have become a tourist attraction.

means.word_mean: 吸引, 吸引力, 诱惑力

sentences.en: What's the attraction of going on the stage?
sentences.cn: 是什么吸引你登上舞台的?

sentences.en: Venice is one of the great tourist attractions of the world.
sentences.cn: 威尼斯是世界上令人向往的旅游胜地之一。

jushi.english: He could not resist the attraction of the sea and became a sailor.
jushi.chinese: 他无法抵御大海的吸引力而当了水手。
